summary: This bill, the SOAR Permanent Authorization Act, amends the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act. It modifies accreditation requirements, removes a limit on student academic assistance funding, and changes standardized testing and evaluation requirements.  The bill also modifies evaluation frequency and standards, including how student progress is measured.  Finally, it permanently authorizes and increases the appropriation for the act, setting the funding at $75,000,000 for fiscal year 2024 and each subsequent year.
